Notes:
-- 0.4.7 
 [1] Print emails right from DotMail. 
 [1] Use the new shortcuts to quickly change inboxes and accounts. 
 [2] Fixes a bug where multiple editing windows could be opened for the same message. 
 [2] Resolves bug where adding or deleting mailboxes wouldn't select another mailbox. 
 [3] Fixes minor graphical bugs.
